headline.print_headline: Lincoln Center Sets Out of Doors Lineup
headline.main: Lyle Lovett, Fiona Apple and Randy Newman to Appear at Lincoln Center Out of Doors

snippet: Lincoln Center will once again host Out of Doors, a series of free performances, for three weeks this summer.
